name: zero-trust-analytics
description: Privacy-focused, anonymous website analytics. Track visitors without compromising their privacy.

scripts.obfuscate: npx javascript-obfuscator src/analytics.js --output static/js/analytics.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-encoding base64 --string-array-threshold 0.75
